rows.label: qst101101_msg0001
rows.name:
Some big-wig in Superbia's put
a boatload of orders in and now I
don't even have time to scratch myself.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0002
rows.name:
All my furniture is made to order,
y'see...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0003
rows.name:
I use only the finest Gulan lumber to
make our customers' furniture-related
dreams come true!

rows.label: qst101101_msg0004
rows.name:
...Hm, actually, I haven't seen you lot
around here. Are you tourists?

rows.label: qst101101_msg0005
rows.name:
Any chance you might've seen
my son Pawli on your way here?

rows.label: qst101101_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, OK... It's just that, normally he
should've come home by now...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0007
rows.name:
I asked him to run an errand for me,
y'see, and he's not back yet.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0008
rows.name:
He's just a kid, so I can let him off with
a little meandering, but sometimes you
can't help but worry, y'know?

rows.label: qst101101_msg0009
rows.name:
I tried negotiating some sort of
deadline extension with our Superbian
client, but no dice.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0010
rows.name:
Not only that, they even threatened to
sue me for all I have if I don't make the
delivery... So I can't go looking myself.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0011
rows.name:
People these days, talking about
public order so much that they forget
basic human decency...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0012
rows.name:
Ah, beg pardon. There I go again,
mouthing off at poor travelers... Please,
pay me no mind. I'm sure it'll be fine.

rows.label: qst101101_msg0013
rows.name:
Oh? No, please, I couldn't
possibly ask you to...

rows.label: qst101101_msg0015
rows.name:
My boy Pawli was headed off to the
Waytree, I believe.

rows.label: qst101102_msg0101
rows.name: My son hasn't come back yet...

rows.label: qst101102_msg0102
rows.name:
He was headed toward the
Waytree near Trigo. I hope
you'll find him OK...
